name: A read permission should be specified for Content Provider to restrict data access from others apps
A Write permission should be specified for Content Provider to restrict data access from others apps
Content Provider should be set as private to protect access from others apps
Ensure deactivating "android:grantUriPermissions" to control URI access
A permission should always be specified at receiver level to control access rights
A permission should always be specified at service level to control access rights
A permission should always be specified at Activity level to control access rights
